ygData.subject: RE: Leatherfoot raider cap quest spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: Careful with this quest Galtin, much like the new bloodforge armor that has replaced the blackened as a reward for the ogre heads quest in BB/Kaladim, I hear
ygData.messageBody:
Careful with this quest Galtin, much like the new bloodforge armor that has
replaced the blackened as a reward for the ogre heads quest in BB/Kaladim, I
hear that the raider cap is now Halfling only.

- Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:37 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Leatherfoot raider cap quest spoiler request
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Since this item is nice for a bard to have (+10 CHR), I
> would like to get
> some help with it from this list.
>
>
> Spoiler space:
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Marshall Anrey in Rivervale gives you this quest. It
> requires you to give
> him a dragoon dirk. In return, he will give you the
> leatherfoot raider cap.
> According to some spoiler sites, you have to give him a polar
> bear skin/hide
> (can't remember which) first before you can do the
> leatherfoot raider cap
> quest. I thought I had read a long time ago on this list
> that you could
> bypass the first quest and just give him the dirk from the
> outset. I tried
> that last night and ended up losing my dragoon dirk without
> getting the cap.
> Can someone who has completed the leatherfoot raider cap
> quest tell me how
> they did it? Also, the Marshall conned amiably to me and I
> was singing the
> carillion when I gave him the dirk. That didn't make a difference.
>
> Thanks
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> I was under the
